attributes.action: Start school at 10am to help teenagers with tiredness
attributes.additional_details: Teenagers’ brains aren’t reactive till about 10.00am so I believe it doesn’t make sense to go in at 8.30 as our knowledge intake isn’t as good. This also means we can sleep for longer. As you may know teens are normally very sleep deprived.
attributes.background: The Government should change the time that schools start to help us take more in.
